La Tuque is accessible by air, road and rail. La Tuque Airport (YLQ) has no commercial flights, but is of course available to those with a private airplane or who wish to charter a flight.
By road, La Tuque is located on Route 155. From
, you take route 55, which becomes route 155 north of Shawinigan.

has a daily bus service that connects Trois-Rivières with La Tuque. It departs Trois-Rivières at 6:00 PM and arrives La Tuque at 8:45 PM. On Sundays, there is an additional service that departs Trois-Rivières at 1:00 PM and arrives La Tuque at 3:39 PM. In the other directions, the daily and Sunday-only services depart La Tuque at 7:15 AM and 5:00 PM, respectively, and arrive Trois-Rivières 10:02 AM and 7:47 PM. has a thrice-weekly service that connects La Tuque to

by train. It departs Montreal on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays at 8:15 AM, arriving La Tuque at 1:18 PM. On the return it departs La Tuque Tuesdays and Thursdays at 11:53 AM, or 2:53 PM on Sundays, arriving back Montreal at 5:15 PM and 8:15 PM, respectively.
